item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 15, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Deepseek R1 Distill 8B Q40 on 4 x Raspberry Pi 5, 6.43 tok/s (eval 11.68 tok/s) (82 points | 16 comments)
2. Carbon capture more costly than switching to renewables, researchers find (113 points | 85 comments)
3. Jane Street's Figgie card game (228 points | 30 comments)
4. The 20 year old PSP can now connect to WPA2 WiFi Networks (327 points | 106 comments)
5. Dust from Car Brakes More Harmful Than Exhaust, Study Finds (103 points | 89 comments)
6. We were wrong about GPUs (674 points | 426 comments)
7. Show HN: Kreuzberg – Modern async Python library for document text extraction (87 points | 41 comments)
8. A decade later, a decade lost (2024) (454 points | 131 comments)
9. The hardest working font in Manhattan (562 points | 79 comments)
10. Increasing rat numbers in cities are linked to climate warming, urbanization (34 points | 9 comments)
11. TL;DW: Too Long; Didn't Watch Distill YouTube Videos to the Relevant Information (169 points | 125 comments)
12. Surprise Magma Chamber Growing Under Mediterranean Volcano (5 points | 1 comment)
13. Diablo hackers uncovered a speedrun scandal (61 points | 35 comments)
14. Nintendo Obtains New Anti-Palworld Patent and Seeks Even More (20 points | 15 comments)
15. Did Semgrep Just Get a Lot More Interesting? (132 points | 52 comments)

17. Complex dynamics require complex solutions (185 points | 123 comments)

20. Recurring checklists using Org Mode in Emacs (55 points | 2 comments)
21. Show HN: I Built a Reddit-style Bluesky client – still rough, but open to ideas (35 points | 10 comments)
22. The Iconic 3DBenchy Enters the Public Domain (174 points | 17 comments)
23. Nping – ping, but with a graph or table view (94 points | 47 comments)
24. What situations in classical physics are non-deterministic? (47 points | 71 comments)
25. TeX and Typst: Layout Models (2024) (214 points | 32 comments)
26. Bookshop.org launches Kindle alternative, sends e-book sales to local bookstores (165 points | 69 comments)
27. Improved evaluation times with pre-resolved Nix store paths (27 points | 30 comments)
28. Goku Flow Based Video Generative Foundation Models (25 points | 5 comments)
29. Show HN: Skies-adsb 2.0 – my 3D plane-tracking web app (45 points | 15 comments)
30. Show HN: Transform your codebase into a single Markdown doc for feeding into AI (258 points | 158 comments)
